<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Vision 2033 – 33 Days Challenge

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1957&user=10620> 	

You’ve likely heard of Vision 2033 – Bridging Horizons. But have you heard from the people driving it forward? Over the coming weeks, colleagues across the Group will share their unique perspectives.
We’re excited to kick off the “Vision 2033 – 33 Days Challenge” with a message from Grace Khoury <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1957&user=10620> , our SVP – Fashion.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

Healthy Ergonomics for Work and Life

Join us on September 10, 2025, at 11:00 AM (Dubai time) for a session with Jacek Wozniakowski, Physiotherapist, as he shares how simple ergonomic habits and posture care can prevent injuries, boost wellbeing, and improve performance. 

Register Here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1958&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1958&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	

Happening Now: Wellbeing Week is Back!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1959&user=10620>

Happening Now: Wellbeing Week is Back!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1959&user=10620> 	

Our Wellbeing Week’s health checks are starting today in HO1. Take a moment for yourself and pass by to check in on your health. All health checks are under one roof offering a wide range of free screenings and consultations. No registration required.

Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1959&user=10620> for more details.

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1960&user=10620>  

Copyright © 2025 Chalhoub Group. All rights reserved. 

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family.
